price: ¡Glorificado sea! Él está por encima de lo que dicen.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يَقُولُونَ عُلُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yaqūlūna ʿuluwwan kabīran
